Entries.DialogueText: Gripping! Fascinating! It's the perfect book for me!
Wow, I can't believe you'd give this to me. It must've cost you a fortune! Thanks!
This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.
For a small town like this, one store is enough! There's too much social pressure for me to overcharge, anyway.
Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?
...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
You would really do that to me? You're terrible.
You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbors are the worst.
How can I possibly compete with Joja?
Their pockets are so deep, they can just sell at a loss until little guys like me are out of business... then they'll jack up their prices!
I'm determined to keep my shop running until the bitter end.
Morris and his cronies will have to drag me out from behind the counter, kicking and screaming!
Abigail's going through a rebellious phase... I get it.
She'll wise up when she has to make her first mortgage payment!
It feels great to be on top! Hah!
Nice effort, though.
I can't believe I lost...
Hey, good luck.
My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. Hehehe.
Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?
Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.
Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.
Better go all out, huh?
I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.
Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.
Don't get any ideas...
If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now...
The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.
It's starting to get cold outside...
That means more people come into the shop to warm up... Hehe.
Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to compete with their selection.
Hi there. Is your farm doing well?
Gahh, no customers! Any more of this 'green' rain, and my ledger will be in the 'red'!
Glad to see you, . What's a little toxic rain when you have seeds to buy?
I'm just kidding. The rain seems to be completely harmless.
Well, I'm glad things are back to normal. Seems like it was all overblown... just like everything.
Hey, it's Mr. , the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.
Hey, it's Ms. , the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.
If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!
A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon...
Well, now that you have dual incomes, I expect you'll be purchasing twice as many seeds, right?
Haha... I'm only joking.... *ahem*...
Hello, er... ${my son
daughter}$?
Welcome! If you're looking for seeds, you've come to the right place!
Hi, . Need any seeds or fruit tree saplings?
Hi, . How's Abigail doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Hey, that's a great idea... It'll be nice to get out from behind the counter. I'll meet you there!
I'm losing a lot of money being away from the shop...
But, you know what? It's worth it.
Drink after drink... Gus must be making a killing!
Eh, let the kids play in the sun. I'll just sit in this chair.
Mmm... that salty smell of the sea is making me want some sashimi.
If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
I'll tell you a secret. Sometimes, when the store is empty, I'll practice my opera singing behind the counter.
Don't tell anyone.
Oh, hi. Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?
I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.
Summer is a good time to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think?
Ugh... It's so hot in here.
Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*
joja#I'm so glad to have a day off from work.|Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!

joja#Running the shop is one of the most important things in my life, but sometimes you just need a day off...|Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!
*sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...
I wish I could go for a walk, but I can't leave the store unattended.
I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great...
I'm happy to buy any produce off you.
I'll give you a fair price, of course!
I really do appreciate your business, Mr. . I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
I really do appreciate your business, Ms. . I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
Hey, . You're my number one customer!
Does Abigail look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.
Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Sometimes I get new items in stock, so make sure to stop by every so often.
It's a lot of work to run a shop.
You know, I used to be a pretty good boxer back in the day... my right hook was the stuff of legend!
Joja#It's my day off today.
Hmmm... what to do...|If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
*sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just bored with domestic life.
When I was younger I always had something interesting to do... now I find myself just wasting time whenever I'm not at work.
joja#Some day I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.
Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money...|Business has been pretty good since JojaMart closed down.
I mainly deal in edibles, so if you've got any ores or wood you'd better try selling them somewhere else.
You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.
It's really going to cut into our profits.
Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?
If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now.
It would be fun to throw a snowball.
I'm going to surprise Caroline tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!
Hi. In the mood for a little shopping?
joja#Finally... a day of relaxation.|Now that Joja is gone, I feel a responsibility to keep the shop open seven days a week. People need groceries!
No... Not this time, Morris.
I think it's time we settled this once and for all.
If you're too scared to fight me then bring one of your co-workers! Or are all Joja employees such cowards?
And the way you throw punches is just like Joja...
Quantity over quality!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H
Entries.DialogueText: Hello there, . So! Your first year in Stardew Valley is almost over, huh?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_1
Entries.DialogueText: If you keep buying seeds from me, you'll be twice as productive next year!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_2
Entries.DialogueText: And I have some exciting news...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_3
Entries.DialogueText: I'll be selling new seed varieties in my shop next year! I should have 1 new variety per season.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_4
Entries.DialogueText: ...Well, that's all I wanted to say. Have a good one.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_1
Entries.DialogueText: You know... I wouldn't even bother trying my competitor's seeds.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Farm/102/z spring/z summer/z fall/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat/y 1/H_1_1
Entries.DialogueText: Pierre's seeds are the *highest* quality seeds you'll find anywhere. That's a promise.
Hey! Who's in the bedroom?
Wha...? How did you find that?!
Quick, give it to me!
50 null 50 70 Event_naga1 50 -500 Event_naga2#Your wife deserves to know about this.
*grumble*...now I have to find a new hiding spot...*grumble*
Welcome To Pierre's! How can I help you?
But... I can't match those prices! I'd be selling at a loss!
50 Percent!?!?
Gus, I have just the thing for you...
It's a bundle of locally sourced, organic, heirloom veggies...
These are hand picked and sorted, to ensure only the very finest in quality and taste.
This is a once-in-a-lifetime kind of offer!
ONLY... *mumble* mumble*
Heh... that's right. It really is a bargain, isn't it?
Wait! How about 10,000g then!?
It's a disaster, ...
I thought this was a surefire business strategy.
But it turns out, no one is willing to buy vegetables at a 10x price markup, even if I put the little 'organic' sticker on them.
By the way, ... you look like you could really use a veggie dinner tonight.
What do you say, wanna buy these back for the low, low price of 2,501g?
You're right, you can't run a business without taking some risk.
Hey, I'm not forcing anyone to buy it! If they don't like the price, they can move on.
Your veggies look great, . It's Pierre's price that turned us away.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H
Entries.DialogueText: No...not this time...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_1
Entries.DialogueText: I remember when I first moved to Pelican Town... This building was active and vibrant.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_1_1
Entries.DialogueText: We worked together to make the town a better place. There was a real sense of community.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_2
Entries.DialogueText: George, you always used to do the crossword puzzle while sipping coffee in the community kitchen. Remember?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_3
Entries.DialogueText: Emily, you wove that custom banner for the Stardew Valley Fair.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_3_1
Entries.DialogueText: I remember you working on that for years!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_4
Entries.DialogueText: Remember when your little crab experiment got out of hand?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_5
Entries.DialogueText: But Gus saved the day with a brilliant idea... A crab leg feast for the entire valley!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_6
Entries.DialogueText: You see, everyone? Our community is what makes Pelican Town special.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_6_1
Entries.DialogueText: When JojaMart came to town we lost sight of that.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_6_2
Entries.DialogueText: But now, thanks to , we have a second chance.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_6_3
Entries.DialogueText: I'm asking that you join me in boycotting JojaMart! We have the power to reclaim our old way of life!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt
Entries.DialogueText: How does it feel?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt_1
Entries.DialogueText: Gather 'round, everyone!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt_2
Entries.DialogueText: Willy!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt_3
Entries.DialogueText: Who's with me?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_implied
Entries.DialogueText: Let's settle this the old-fashioned way.
Abigail?!
I've been looking all over for you! Your mother wants you to come home and help with dinner!
What are you doing in the graveyard, anyway? This is no place for a young lady!
Come back!
Okay, my dad won't find us here...
Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.
I can't say it was a hit...
... well,... back to business, huh?
My wife loved it! ...And Abby even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce.
Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on...
Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad!
My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!
I'm confident that I'll emerge victorious in this year's grange display competition!
Ah, it's farmer ! I have quite the selection of wares tonight. Take a look!
Hey! How'd you get back here?Don't touch anything.
Trying to make a back-room deal, huh? Hah! I admire your gumption.
What! How'd you get back here?Don't touch anything.

Hey, you shouldn't be back here!Well, if you're sticking around... mind manning the booth for a while? I want to taste Linus' sweet and tangy jelly.I'm joking, I can't bear to be away from the register...
Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?Now if only the Mayor would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.
The moment Lewis steps away from the governor... that's my moment to rub elbows...Ah, I didn't see you there.If you want to buy something, talk to me on the other side of the counter.
Psst... Make sure to swing by the shop tomorrow to get your fall seeds!
Hello, farmer . Be sure to drop by my store tomorrow to purchase your fall seeds!
My sales figures have been phenomenal lately... thanks to the Feast of the Winter Star!Boy, holidays are good for business. I wonder if I could invent some new ones...
Need any last minute gifts? I've got you covered! Take a look at my wares.
This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore...
Our family has matching Winter Star sweaters.Now, if only Abigail would wear hers...
This is my all-time favorite! Thank you!
That's very kind of you. I like this.
This isn't exactly my favorite...
Please, never bring this to me again.
A present? Thanks!
